docs.text:
Awesome Web Development 
¶


A curated list of impressive framework, libraries, software and resources for your project on web development.


Inspired by 
Awesome




Contents


Editors


Front-End Development


Back-End Development








Editors
¶




Visual Studio Code
 - Cross-platform open-source text editor.


Atom
 - Open-source and hackable text editor.


Sublime Text


Brackets


Vim


Emacs




Front-End Development
¶


HTML
¶




HTML5
 - Markup language used for websites & web apps.


Web Performance Optimization


Web Tools


Web Components




CSS3
¶




CSS


Critical-Path Tools


Scalability


Must-Watch Talks


Protips






Sass
 - CSS preprocessor.


Less
 - CSS preprocessor.




Javascript
¶




Polymer
 - JavaScript library to develop Web Components.




Framework
¶




React
 - App framework.


Relay
 - Framework for building data-driven React apps.






Ember
 - App framework.


Vue.js
 - App framework.


Marionette.js
 - App framework.


Aurelia
 - App framework.


Cycle.js
 - Functional and reactive JavaScript framework.


choo
 - App framework.


Next.js
 - Framework for server-rendered React apps.


Preact
 - App framework.


Angular
 - App framework.




Backbone
 - App framework.






ES6 Tools




SVG
 - XML-based vector image format.


Canvas


KnockoutJS


Dojo Toolkit


Inspiration


Android UI


iOS UI


Meteor


BEM


Flexbox


Web Typography


Web Accessibility


Material Design


D3
 - Library for producing dynamic, interactive data visualizations.


Emails


jQuery
 - Easy to use JavaScript library for DOM manipulation.


Tips






Web Audio


Offline-First


Static Website Services


A-Frame VR
 - Virtual reality for web browsers.


Text Editing


Motion UI Design


Charting


Ionic Framework 2


Chrome DevTools


PostCSS
 - CSS tool.


Draft.js
 - Rich text editor framework for React.


Service Workers


Progressive Web Apps


Redux
 - State container for JavaScript apps.


webpack
 - Module bundler.


Browserify
 - Module bundler.


Ant Design
 - Enterprise-class UI design language.


WebGL
 - JavaScript API for rendering 3D graphics.


Progressive Enhancement


Hyperapp
 - Tiny JavaScript library for building web apps.




Back-End Development
¶




Django


Flask


Docker


Vagrant


Pyramid


Play1 Framework


CakePHP
 - PHP framework.


Symfony


Education






Laravel
 - PHP framework.


Education






Rails
 - Web app framework for Ruby.


Gems
 - Packages.






Phalcon


Useful 
.htaccess
 Snippets


nginx
 - Web server.


Dropwizard


Kubernetes


Lumen


Serverless Framework


Apache Wicket
 - Java web app framework.


Vert.x
 - Toolkit for building reactive apps on the JVM.


Terraform
 - Tool for building, changing, and versioning infrastructure.


Vapor
 - Server-side development in Swift.




Contributing
¶


Your contributions are always welcome! Please take a look at the 
contribution guidelines
 first.


I will keep some pull requests open if I'm not sure whether those libraries are awesome, you could 
vote for them
 by adding :+1: to them. Pull requests will be merged when their votes reach 
1
.




If you have any question about this opinionated list, do not hesitate to contact me 
@santosandrick1
 on Twitter or open an issue on GitHub.
